core_attr_t Struct Reference
Stratify OS » Device Interface » Core Microcontroller Access

Core IO Attributes. More...

#include <core.h>

Detailed Description

This structure defines the attributes structure for configuring the Core port.

Data Fields

u32 o_flags
 
u32 freq
 

Field Documentation

u32 core_attr_t::freq

This is used with the clock out flags to set the output frequency

u32 core_attr_t::o_flags

Setting certain flags will configure the core as described
